reviewText: Barbara shows us how to create beautiful art jewelry using stain glass copper foil and lead free solder. Using easy to learn techniques you can be making fun and unique jewelry in minutes. An inexpensive craft soldering iron and some stain glass copper foil and solder are the main supplies to start you on a new crafting adventure. This video shows the basic foiling technique, basic soldering technique and three projects from beginning to end, step by step.
